branchCategory.name: AS
branchCategory.description: <P>SMC's low particulate generating speed controllers, the AS-FPQ/FPG series, were designed for use in clean rooms. The one-touch fittings minimize installation time, reduce mounting height and enable a more compact machine design.</P>

branchItem.name: AS-FPQ/FPG, Speed Controller, One-touch Fitting, Clean Room
